name: Crimsonspill Crystal Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Increases <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> by 10% for 180 seconds.

name: Greenspill Crystal Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Increases <font color="#E0B985">maximum stamina</font> by 15% for 180 seconds.

name: Crimson Crystal Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Restores 50% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font>.

name: Crimson Crystal Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Restores 50% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font>.

name: Cerulean Crystal Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Restores 50% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum FP</font>.

name: Cerulean Crystal Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Restores 50% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum FP</font>.

name: Speckled Hardtear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Cures <font color="#E0B985">all status ailments</font>, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all resistances</font> by 90 for 180 seconds.

name: Crimson Bubbletear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Restores 30% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> if HP falls below 20% within 180 seconds. This effect can only be triggered once.

This will not prevent death if HP reaches 0% before the healing effect is triggered.

name: Opaline Bubbletear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Reduces <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 90% for the next single attack received within 180 seconds.

name: Crimsonburst Crystal Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Restores 7 HP per second for 180 seconds.

name: Greenburst Crystal Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Increases <font color="#E0B985">stamina regeneration</font> by 15 per second for 180 seconds.

name: Opaline Hardtear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage negation</font> by 15% for 180 seconds.

name: Winged Crystal Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Increases <font color="#E0B985">maximum equip load</font> by 350% for 180 seconds.

name: Thorny Cracked Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage inflicted</font> after multiple attacks within a short time. There are 3 tiers of damage increase: 9%, 13%, and 20%. The tear's effect lasts for 180 seconds, although the damage bonus resets if no attacks are performed within a short amount of time.

The number of attacks required to trigger this effect varies per weapon, and is not based on damage or weapon speed. It generally requires 3-4 attacks to trigger the first tier, 5-8 attacks for the second, and 8-11 attacks for the third. Some weapons are too slow to trigger all tiers.

name: Spiked Cracked Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Increases <font color="#E0B985">all attack power</font> of charged melee attacks by 15% for 180 seconds.

This effect does not work for charged sorceries, incantations, or weapon skills.

name: Windy Crystal Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Increases invulnerability duration for dodge rolls but increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 15% for 180 seconds.

This effect doesn't stack with the Crucible Feather Talisman.

name: Ruptured Crystal Tear
caption:
A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.

A defective crystal tear which possesses absolutely no medicinal qualities. A lesson said to be learned the hard way for some; faith can be a volatile matter, after all.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Creates an explosion of <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage</font> 3 seconds after consuming, but inflicts 300 damage on yourself. Having 2 Ruptured Crystal Tears in the Flask of Wondrous Physick increases the damage and doubles the size of the explosion, but also increases the damage to yourself to 700.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (1 tear):</font> 800
<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (2 tears):</font> 1750
